<h1>Donating To Mongrel2</h1>

<p>The Mongrel2 Project is volunteer run and mostly written by me, <a href="http://zedshaw.com">Zed A. Shaw</a>.  If you believe in the project's goal of a truly programming language agnostic practical bad ass web server, then please donate.  You can also see a list of <a href="http://localhost:8080/wiki?name=Donors">Donors</a> so far.</p>

<h2>Donate With Amazon (US Only)</h2>

<p>
<b>Amazon is currently reviewing the Mongrel2.org donations</b> and may return the money that has been donated so far.  Once they've made a decision
I will notify everyone who donated personally and make sure you get every penny.  I'm also not going to use Amazon for donations anymore because of
how irritating this is and their fairly lax policy of allowing donations then denying them after a sum has been submitted.
